inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test error with_error

1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test error with_empty_error
inline.expectedResult: App shows "Error Executing Command" and "Unknown Error"

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test error with_invalid_navigate 
3. Send
inline.expectedResult: App shows "Error Executing Command" and "Response type is `navigate` butno urls was included in the response"

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test error with_invalid_form 
3. Send
inline.expectedResult: App shows "Error Executing Command" and "Response type is `form` but no form was included in the response"

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test error with_404_error
3. Send

1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test error with_html_site
3. Send
inline.expectedResult: Invalid character < looking fir beginning of value

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test with_lookup_error
3. Send
inline.expectedResult: Invalid character < looking fir beginning of value

inline.description:
